0.0.1.en: Added support for Tuya Zigbee Temperature & Humidity Sensor

0.0.2.en: Added support for Malmbergs White Label Brand

0.0.3.en: Added support for Tuya Zigbee LCD Temperature & Humidity Sensor

0.0.4.en: Added support for Alecto White Label Brand

0.0.5.en: Added support for Smart9 White Label Brand

0.0.6.en: Added support for Blitzwolf White Label Brand

0.0.7.en: Added support for Zemismart White Label Brand

0.1.0.en: Rewrite for SDK3 / Homey Firmware v5

0.1.1.en: Added support for more white label devices and killed some bugs

0.1.2.en: Rewrite to use IASZone Cluster (Good job adding support for it TED!)

0.1.4.en: Added support for Smart Plug (needs testing)

0.1.5.en: Added support for Samotech White Label Brand

0.1.6.en: Added support for 1 Gang Switch Module and 2 Gang Switch Module

0.1.7.en: Added product ID's and fixed 2 Gang Switch Module Channel 2

0.1.8.en: Added 1 Gang Dimmer Module, 2 Gang Dimmer Module and added support for Lonsonho White Label Brand

0.1.10.en: Added 1 Gang Wall Switch, 2 Gang Wall Switch and 3 Gang Wall Switch

0.1.13.en: Added support for LED Strip Controller

0.1.14.en: Added support for RGB Bulb E27, RGB Bulb E14, RGB Spot GU10, RGB LED Strip, Tunable Bulb E27, Tunable Bulb E14, Tunable Spot GU10, Plug, 3 Socket Power Strip

0.1.15.en: Fix: Power Strip only triggered socket 1

0.1.17.en: Fix for RGB Bulb/LED Brightness issues

0.1.20.en: Added support for Lidl Smart Motion Sensor and Lidl Smart Door/Window Sensor (old driver for Lidl Smart Door/Window Sensor removed)

0.1.22.en: Fix for Smart Plug with Metering

0.1.23.en: Fix for Smart Door / Window and Smart Motion Sensors

0.1.24.en: Added support for 4 Socket Power Strip and added product ID's to some devices (and some changes to Smart Plug)

0.1.27.en: Extended use of Composer templates. Fix for Smart Plug with metering

0.1.28.en: Fix for Smart Plug with metering

0.1.29.en: Added support for BlitzWolf Smart Light Switch Module 1 Gang

0.1.34.en: Fix for Christmas Lights firework effect. Fix for Smart Plug. Added some Device ID's.

0.1.38.en: Support for Curtain Switch Module and additional PIR Sensor.

0.1.39.en: Fix for RGB lights. Added support for Lidl/Livarno Spot GardenLight. Added calibration to Curtain Module. Added some Id's to already supported units.
